thoughts.text: Now that we have created the 'data_collection.py' file, we can proceed to write the necessary functions to collect data from cryptocurrency exchanges and websites. We will start by writing a function to get data from cryptocurrency exchange APIs. We will then write a function to get data from social media platforms, news websites, and forums.
thoughts.reasoning: Writing functions to collect data from cryptocurrency exchanges and websites will allow us to collect accurate and up-to-date data on meme coins. Starting with the function to get data from cryptocurrency exchange APIs will allow us to collect data on the most popular exchanges. Writing a function to get data from social media platforms, news websites, and forums will allow us to collect data on the most talked-about meme coins.
thoughts.plan:
- Write a function to get data from cryptocurrency exchange APIs
- Write a function to get data from social media platforms, news websites, and forums
thoughts.criticism: I should ensure that the functions I write are efficient and accurate. I should also ensure that the data I collect is relevant and up-to-date.

We will start by writing a function to get data from cryptocurrency exchange APIs. We will then write a function to get data from social media platforms, news websites, and forums. I will ensure that the functions I write are efficient and accurate, and that the data I collect is relevant and up-to-date.
